Q.1. It is 4 hrs. 40 min. in a clock. Find the angle between both the needles of a clock.
Q.2. At what time between 7 and 8 0’clock will the hands of a clock be in the same straight line, but not together?
Q.3. What will be the angle formed between two needles of a clock at 8 hrs. 20 min ?
Q.4. At what time between 5:30 and 6 0’clock will the hands of clock be at right angle?
Q.5. A clock rings for once at 1.00 o’clock, for twice at 2.00 o’clock & so on at every hour. For how many times in a day it rings?
